act_pit.actname: Ministry of International Business and Immigration Act

change.changenote: Section 6 BEFORE repealed by 2000-23-48, effective March 31, 2002.

subsection.subsectiontext: The minister must each year submit to the Lieutenant Governor in Council an annual report for the fiscal year ending March 31 respecting the work performed by the ministry.
The minister must lay the report before the Legislative Assembly as soon as is practicable.
